kpi_info.title: Average 2G Attached Subscribers per HLR
kpi_info.use: Average number of 2G attached subscribers per HLR during the measurement period.
kpi_info.formula:
For OBJECT level:
SUM( AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_2G - AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_2G_DET )

For TIME level:
AVG( AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_2G - AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_2G_DET )

Counters from AGGREGATED view(s)
